versos: (goings) Ezekiel 24:21 - Speak unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I will profane my sanctuary, the excellency of your strength, the desire of your eyes, and that which your soul pitieth; and your sons and your daughters whom ye have left shall fall by the sword.;;;
(milcah) Genesis 11:29 - And Abram and Nahor took wives for themselves. The name of Abram's wife was Sarai
(tahath) Numbers 16:31 - And it came to pass
(ezion) 1 Kings 9:26 - King Solomon also built ships at ezion Geber
(gezer) 1 Kings 9:16 - Pharaoh king of Egypt had attacked and captured gezer. He had set it on fire. He killed its Canaanite inhabitants and then gave it as a wedding gift to his daughter
(jabin) Judges 4:2 - "And the Lord sold them into the hand of jabin king of Canaan, that reigned in Hazor; the captain of whose host was Sisera, which dwelt in Harosheth of the Gentiles.";;;
(entrance) Psalm 118:19 - "Open for me the gates of the righteous; I will enter and give thanks to the Lord.";;;
(riblah) Jeremiah 39:5 - "The Babylonian army pursued King Zedekiah and overtook him in the plains of Jericho. All his soldiers were separated from him and scattered, and he was captured.";;;
(outward) 2 Corinthians 4:16 - "Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, yet inwardly we are being renewed day by day.";;;
(refuge) Psalm 46:1 - "God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.";;;
(slayer) Genesis 9:6 - "Whoever sheds human blood, by humans shall their blood be shed; for in the image of God has God made mankind.";;;
(avenger) Romans 13:4 - "For he is the servant of God, an avenger who carries out God's wrath on the wrongdoer.";;;
(murderer) 1 John 3:15 - "Anyone who hates a brother or sister is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life residing in him.";;;
(revenger) Romans 12:19 - "Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.";;;
(laying) Matthew 8:14 - When Jesus came into Peter's house
(testify) John 3:32 - "He testifies to what he has seen and heard, but no one accepts his testimony.";;;
(lebanon) "The trees of the Lord are watered abundantly, the cedars of lebanon that he planted." - Psalms 104:16;;;
